name: Fxplus.github.io
body:
[Falmouth Exeter Plus](http://fxplus.ac.uk) use a variety of technologies to communicate and collaborate with and in support of students.

* [Slack.com](https://fxplus.slack.com) allows ongoing private discussion within the organisation.
* [knowdium](https://www.knodium.com/) provides forums that are accessible across HE institutions
* [loomio](http://loomio.org/g/l1ZDoOJg/falmouth-exeter-plus) facilitates collaborative decision making
* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/falmouthexeter) allows for communication of events and open public dialogue with students/staff and beyond

If you work for Falmouth Exeter Plus and would like access to any of these services contact your [technologist](mailto:thomas.readings@fxplus.ac.uk)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
